ygData.subject: Re: a bunch of questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: David  To: Shadowknight  Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 11:37 AM Subject: [shadowknight] a bunch of
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: David <milamber@...>
To: Shadowknight <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 11:37 AM
Subject: [shadowknight] a bunch of questions


> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> Since the list is dead.
>
> I was watching the auctions last night on the newly edited Jewelry items
and
> saw someone selling a AC1 +5hp +5mana ring of some kind for 10pp. Does
any
> one know of any item(s) that would allow us to regenerate hp faster ...
like
> a troll, me not being one of course. I would assume that the +5hp is not
a
> regeneration just adds 5hp to someone which to me (and I would think a lot
> of higher level players) is worthless along with the mana, and I already
get
> AC1 from my cutthroat rings without the 10pp cost.

*nods, wish my necro had it though*
>
> Also, did anyone find out about the "Bind ring" that is in the Necro/SK
> guild house, or is that a broken quest also?
>
> I have a full suit of leather armor. I was just wondering what is the
> proper order of increase that the armor should be? I think I have it as:
>
> Leather
> Banded
> Chain
> Bronze Plate
> Plate
>
*ermm, your proper order will be*
leather
banded
Bronze plate
Rubicite (which i think offers those regen properties u seek)
> I have no clue if I am missing something. I need to get to the next
level,
> and don't think I can do it without getting better armor (which would be
> banded if I am correct).
>
> I have heard rumors about killing so many residents of Befallen that you
> eventually can't get into our guild with out a KOS from the ghouls
outside,
> with out casting inv to undead. Is this true or false or don't know. I
> consider the ghouls and they con warmly to me right now, not sure what
that
> means other than they aren't going to attack me right now.
"*i think they are rumours, only faction i have seen is against befallen*
>
> Should I be hunting in Befallen ... alone? (I really don't care about the
> above, as long as the npc inside don't attack me along with their pets).
> And can I get armor their for free off the SK's in the back? Just a note
I
> hate rabies. And I guess does anyone know of an item (Jewelry) that would
> protect me/us from disease, a 100% would be nice?
> *nope* *just keep that invis to undead on till ya find what your looking
for*

> And that is about it for now. I am sure I will have more questions
later...
> if the list goes dead again :)
*hope I was sme help*
Morgul>

> Tenin - Tarew Marr
>
>
>
>
>
